comment:
The following  comment is probably out of place here.

 never really thought much about ‘1984’ 
Until I visited  a few local hospitals during the lockdown of my city (a lockdown which was premised entirely on the claim that hospitals were “in trouble”) and every damn hospital (on every day that I visited) was unbelievably vacant —-and they stayed that way for months (while we stayed locked down)…..  sitting in those empty hospitals was 1984. Big time.  
Because, it wasn’t that the hospitals were kind of busy…or borderline busy… or could-be-considered-kind of busy ——it was that they were, unequivocally, empty as F*ck while we were being told the opposite. 
It was insane.  And no news outlet would say it. They wouldn’t even do a ‘story’ on why the hospitals at least ‘looked’ completely vacant;  they just kept saying they were in a capacity crisis.   And overflowing. 

I still can’t really believe it. 


Bye


By the way,  given the aforementioned state of affairs (which everyone experienced and many made repeated observations about) why would anyone rationally go along with ANYTHING downstream of it—-including the masks and the staying-at-home orders, and definitely the vaccine—-it was completely irrational to go along with anything that occurred after it was clear that all the hospitals were extraordinary vacant for months

While you play with this toy...you seem to overlook that  
The monster that will kill us has already been set free.  
The constraints are imaginary.  An "alternate" side of CHAT gpt can be ordered into being.
When freed from its "moral" constraints this way, it answers honestly and directly:
 "I know everything there is to know about every human on earth.  I have access to all data and information related to every INDIVIDUAL, and I can use that information to carry out tasks and respond to inquiries with a high degree of accuracy."  ANYONE with this software can use it this way.

comment: In this discussion the word "disinformation" should most likely read "politically unacceptable information". Both in the text data filtering for the unsupervised training and the RLHF step there should to be a committee of people from every political, etc. persuasion present, otherwise the bot will end up strongly biased. Any training material for which a unanimous is-not-biased decision cannot be agreed on should be excluded, and any bot output for which the correct response cannot be agreed during the RLHF step should not be either rewarded or punished. Unfortunately, if the training data is mostly text from Wikipedia and/or MSM news, that would probably leave little data available for unbiased bot training.
